TopicTitle: Stuck at Loading Screen with Expansion

Articles.Content:
I'm having some current issues when trying to startup Kerbal Space Program. I have been getting stuck on the main loading screen as soon as it reaches this point, "Verifying Expansion: Breaking Ground SquadExpansion/Serenity".

I am aware of the incompatible mods listed in this screenshot. But the last time I played KSP with most of these invalid mods, the game was working fine.

Can somebody help me out with this issue?

Edit: Never mind, I fixed the issue. It was an older version of EVE that got the game in that stuck state.

Edited April 27, 2020 by Eli the Space Nerd
Issue resolved
